creator.description:
Fighting disinformation. 
Evaluating posts for links to disinformation sites, social media users or Bluesky mentions who is known for disinformation. Do not evaluate user profiles or behavior. User will be labeled if post with disinfo passes threshhold.

locales.description: Badge of honor. NAFO fella, fighting disinformation and helping Ukraine.
locales.name: NAFO

locales.description: Long service as NAFO fella, fighting disinformation and helping Ukraine.
locales.name: NAFO elderly

locales.description: User has posted MAGA related posts over threshold and is permanently labeled. All user post will be labeled without regard on content.
locales.name: MAGA

locales.description: The user has proven to be a scammer. The label requires more evidence than just a report. Link to post or thread with in-depth material is preferred.
locales.name: Fundraising scammer

locales.description: User has posted pro-kremlin related posts over threshold and is permanently labeled. All user post will be labeled without regard on content.
locales.name: Pro-Kremlin

locales.description: The post contains link to known disinformation website.
locales.name: Disinformation network
